cardText: At the start of a contract, +1 Card if you have no Reactors in your hand.
Your first Reactor played gives an extra Action.
At the start of a contract, +1 Card if you have no Shields in your hand.
Roll 1 less Hazard Die
Start every contract with +1 Action.
As 1 Action, discard a Damage 1 and a Damage 2 to deal 5 Damage.
Discard any 2 cards as 1 Action to play as a Shield.
Your first Shield played counts as 2 Shields.
Play your first Shield without using an Action.
At the start of a contract, +1 Card if you have no Thrusters in your hand.
Your hand limit becomes 6 instead of 5.
Allies receive +1 Card at the start of a contract.
As 1 Action, you may play a Damage 1 as a Damage 3. Then add a Miss to your discard.
If you play 2 or more Reactors, the requirement for Damage is 1 less.
Play your first Damage card without using an Action.
+2 Cards when you play your first Damage card.
Trash a Damage 1 from your hand, requirement for Damage is 3 less.
Requirement is 2 less for Damage if you don't play a Shield.
As 1 Action, discard 2 Damage 1 cards to deal 4 Damage.
At the start of a contract, +2 Cards if you have no Damage cards in your hand.
Once per contract, you may discard up to 3 Cards, allies then draw an equal number.
All players can play 1 Damage 1 without using an Action.
+1 Card per Hazard Dice targeting you.
Allies start with an extra Action.
Discard 2 of the same card as 1 Action to play as a Shield, Thruster, Reactor, or Damage 1.
Requirement for Reactors is 1 less.
Discard a Damage 1 from your hand, +2 Actions.
Once per contract, you may block 1 HAzard by trashing a card from your hand.
Once per contract, you may play a Crew Member twice, Each use requires an Action.
Each Shield played also reduces the Damage requirement by 1.
Requirement for Damage is 1 less.
As Mission Leader or ally, gain +1 Action for each ally.
Once per contract, you may discard up to 3 Cards, then draw an equal number.
Once per contract, play a Damage 1 as a Damage 3.
Requirement for Shields is 1 less.
Requirement for Thrusters is 1 less.
As Mission Leader, +1 Card at the start of a contract.
When you stay at base, gain 4 Credits instead of 1.
Reactor cards don't require an Action to play.
Your first Thruster played negates a Hazard Die.
Gain an Action for each Hazard you block with a Shield.
You may play Miss cards as a Shield, Thruster, Reactor, or Damage 1.
Once per Contract, you may pay 2 Credits to draw a default loadout card from the supply to your hand.
Gain +1 Credit for each of your Hazard blocked.
Before playing cards, you may discard your entire hand. If you do, +5 Cards.
You may trash a Reactor to gain +4 Actions.
You may trash a Damage and a Card from your hand to add a Damage of one tier higher into your hand.
Prestige costs 1 less Faction Rep.
All Faction Rep rewards except Prestige cost 1 less, minimum 1.
Trading Faction Rep is now a 2:1 ratio.
Once per contract, you may trash a card to gain 1 Faction Rep in your lowest faction.
You may roll 1 additional Hazard Die. Gain Faction Rep equal to Hazard rolled on that dice.
You may spend any amount of Faction Rep to reduce the requirement for Damage an equal amount.
Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to block 1 Hazard.
Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to gain +1 Action.
Once per contract, you may trash a Reactor card from your hand to gain a Faction Rep.
Once per contract, you may spend a Faction Rep to reduce a requirement by 1.
You may choose to change 1 of the contract requirement type to Shields. This applies to everyone on the contract.
Once per contract, you may trash a shield from your hand and add a Shield+ to your discard pile.
Once per contract, if you play 2 Reactor cards in a row, draw +2 Cards.
Once per contract, you may give an ally a Reactor or a Thruster card from the supply into their hand.
You may only buy this if you have 2 other Henko ship parts installed on your ship.
Once per contract, you may trash a Reactor from your hand and add a Reactor + to your discard pile.
Discard any Shield from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] to subtract 1 Shield requirement.
Discard 2 cards from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 2 [IO] to block 1 Hazard.
Add 1 [IO] to this ship part to draw +1 Card. When this card has 4 [IO] on it, remove this ship part.
Add 1 [IO] to this card for every contract you complete. Remove 3 [IO] to play any card twice as 1 Action.
Twice per contract, you may roll a Hazard Dice and add 1 [IO]. Remove 1 [IO] to subtract 1 from any requirement.
Discard any Reactor from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 3 [IO] to add a Reactor+ to your discard.
After a contract, add 1 [IO] for every unblocked Hazard. Remove 1 [IO] to re-roll a Hazard Die targeting you.
Discard any Reactor from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] for +1 Action.
Discard any Thruster from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] for +1 Card.
Once per contract, each ally may choose to give you 1 card from their hand. You may trash it, or place it into your hand.
Add 1 [IO] to this card for every Hazard you block. Remvoe 2 [IO] to deal 1 Damage.
Discard 2 Damage cards from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remove 1 [IO] to deal 1 Damage.
Add 1 [IO] to this card every time you play a Damage 2. Remove 4 [IO] from this card to double your played Damage.
Once per contract, spend 1 additional Action when playing a Damage card to double it's Damage value.
At the start of a contract, if there is a Miss in your hand, draw +2 Cards.
Once per contract, you must either trash a card or add 1 Miss to your discard pile.
When any other player trashes a card, you may add that card to your discard pile.
Once per contract, you may trash a Damage from your hand and add a Damage+ to your discard pile.
Once per contract, you and an ally may trade 1 card from your hands.
Once per contract, you may take a card form your hand and give it to an ally. They must put that card into their hand.
If there are 2 or more Hazard Dice targeting you, gain 1 Credit.
Once per contract, you may trash a Thruster from your hand and add a Thruster+ to your discard pile.
When discarding your cards at the end of a contract, you may add 1 of the discarded cards to the top of your draw pile.
Discard 2 cards to add 1 [IO] to this card. Spend 3 [IO] to add a copy of any action card in your hand to your discard pile.
Once per contract, you may trash a card from your hand to add 1 [IO] to this card. Remvove 4 [IO] for +1 Prestige.
Once per contract, discard the top card of your draw pile. If it isn't a Crew, add a copy of that card to your discard pile.
Anytime you trash a card, gain 2 Credits.
Once per contract, you may trash 2 cards from your hand to subtract 3 from any 1 requirement
When playing any Thruster, you may discard the first card drawn and draw an additional card.
Once per contract, look at the top card of your draw pile. Return this card back to the top of your draw pile or discard it.
If you fail a contract, gain 3 Credits.
You may discard a Crew to reduce Crew contract requirement by 2.
Once per turn, you may trash a card to gain +2 Actions.
As Mission Leader, draw 5 contracts instead of 3 when you travel to a sector.
Roll an additional Hazard Die every contract. All Thruster cards draw an additional card.
Once per contract, discard 3 unique cards to reduce a contract requirement by 2.
When drawing an Event, draw 3 and choose 1. Return the other 2 to the bottom of the Event deck.
At the start of a contract, draw and play the top card of your draw pile without using an Action.
If you are alone in a sector, reduce any contract requirement by 2.
Without changing the order, you may look at the top 2 cards in your draw pile at any time.
As Mission Leader or ally, you may travel freely to any sector including your current sector.
Draw +2 Cards everytime you roll a Double Hazard.
Subtract 1 from the result of every dice you roll.
Gain +1 Action every time an ally rolls a die.
Once per contract, you may re-roll any 1 of your dice that was rolled for any reason.
At the start of a contract, guess a card type. All allies +1 Card, gain 1 Credit for each matching card.
Trash 1 Shield to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to block 2 Hazard.
Trash 1 Reactor to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark matter card to reduce Reactor requirements by 2.
Trash 1 Thruster to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to reduce Thruster requirements by 2.
Trash 1 Damage to gain a Dark Matter card. As 1 Action, play 2 Dark Matter cards to deal 6 Damage.
Trash 1 Damage to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to deal 2 Damage.
Trash 1 Thruster to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card for +3 Cards.
Trash 1 Reactor to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card for +3 Actions.
Trash 1 Shield to gain a Dark Matter card. Play a Dark Matter card to reduce Shield requirements by 2.
Trash a Miss to gain a Dark Matter card. For every Dark Matter card you play, +2 Credits.
Trash a Miss to gain a Dark Matter card. As 1 Action, play 2 Dark Matter cards to gain an Objective card.
At the start of a contract, roll a [[Moonrollers die]]. On [[Damage]], add a Damage 2 to your hand. On [[Wild]], you must trash a card.
Roll a [[Moonrollers die]] for each Hazard Dice targeting you. Block a Hazard Die for each [[Wild]] or [[Shield]] rolled.
Once per contract, roll 2 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Play 1 matching card without using an Action. Play any card on [[Wild]] or Crew on [[Extra die]].
Once per contract, roll a [[Moonrollers die]]. Reduce a matching contract requirement by 2. Any requirement on [[Wild]] or [[Extra die]].
Once per contract, roll 4 [[Moonrollers dice]]. Allies gain +1 Actions for each [[Reactor]] and draw +1 Cards for each [[Thruster]].

ruleClarifications.description: You can choose to not roll any [[Hazard Dice]] you have to roll, including those from contracts and abilities.
When using this [[Ship Part]], you cannot search in the deck for required cards with {{crew/Zek Zarag}}.
You can discard any 2 [[Cards]] even if they are of different types.
The used [[Shield]] is treated as a [[Shield]] card.
All types of [[Shield]] can trigger this, including [[Shield+]] (2 [[Hazards]] blocked and [[+2 Actions]]) and [[Shield×]] (4 [[Hazards]] blocked).
Both [[Shields]] trigger effects regarding [[Shields]], but only the first (actually played) [[Shield]] trigger effects regarding [[Shield]] cards.
“Play as“ cards, such as {{crew/[REDACTED]}}, also counts as a [[Shield]] card and can be played for free.
Draw 6 instead of 5 cards anytime you refresh your hand.
You cannot use “play as” cards to activate this [[Ship Part]]. This includes {{shipParts/SOS}} and {{shipParts/The Dauntless}}.
If there are no more [[Miss]] in the armory, you get nothing.
It is a one-time ability per contract.
[TBC] {{crew/Crusse Parke}} cannot activate this [[Ship Part]] (as there is no [[Damage]] 4 card).
You may trash a card even if there is no [[Damage]] requirement in a Contract.
The 2 [[Damage 1]] cards played for this [[Ship Part]] cannot stack with {{crew/Kary Powak}}'s ability.
Each ally draws the amount of [[Cards]] you discarded.
Aside from your turn, the Contract Leader decides the timing when you can choose to activate this [[Ship Part]].
You cannot stack this with {{shipParts/The Pursuer}}. Meaning you cannot discard up to 3 [[Cards]] to activate both [[Ship Parts]].
"All players" means those who participate in a contract that you are in.
[TBC] You may not trash a [[Card]] if there is no [[Hazard]] to negate.
You don't have to play the repeated [[Crew]] consecutively.

If you play [[Crews]] with [[IO Sphere]] stacked on them twice, 2 individual [[IO Sphere]] pools (of 3) are created. You may remove one [[IO Sphere]] from each pool per contract. This includes {{crew/IO MK8}}, {{crew/IO L1-ON}}, {{crew/IO-MG21}}, {{crew/IO Wraith 3000}}, {{crew/IO Mirage}}.
[Special] You can play {{crew/B3-AR}} again but cannot use it to retrieve the first {{crew/B3-AR}}.
[TBC] You cannot play a [[Crew]] from the Mercenary twice.

The [[1 Damage]] does not trigger effects regarding [[Damage]] cards. This includes {{shipParts/MG Charge Core}}, {{shipParts/The Quantum Driver}}, {{shipParts/MG Warp}}, {{objectives/Fire Support}}, {{crew/Kary Powalk}}.
You cannot stack this with {{shipParts/Multi Stage M1}}. Meaning you cannot discard up to 3 [[Cards]] to activate both [[Ship Parts]].
You may play a [[Reactor]] even if you have run out of [[actions]].
[[Cards]] that are played as a [[Reactor]] can activate Fission, e.g. [[Miss]] from {{shipParts/SOS}}.
The [[Credits]] are rewarded after the contract has ended.
This applies to negated [[Hazards]].
You may redraw indefinitely before playing any cards but this is not recommended.
You have to change the requirements before any cards are played.
This can apply to head-to-head contracts.
[Unruled] If this is acquired from other means than buying (e.g. gaining a bonus card), you can ignore the requirement of Henko ship parts.
[Contradiction] One can essentially continually discard cards and gaining benefits from [[Ship Parts]], then refill the cards using {{shipParts/Hypershift}}.
Source contradicting above above ruling.
Trashed cards from any other means do not fulfill this requirement.
[Unruled] Discarding and replacing cards from the Armory (using [[Credits]] or as a free action in the expansions) does not qualify for this [[Ship Part]].
Head to head contracts would not be failed.
After guessing a card type, all allies draw one card. The one with this ship part then gains 1 [[Credit]] for each card drawn that matches the guessed type.
